message:
Hefajat attacked Kabir and Muntasir
Apr 6, 2013 

Activists of  Hefajat-e Islam attacked a rally of  Ekattorer Ghatak Dalal Nirmul Committee and vandalised its makeshift podium at Mohakhali in the capital Saturday morning.

Imdadul Islam, a sub-inspector of Gulshan Police Station, sustained minor injury when the attackers hurled brick chips on the rally around 9:30am.

Shariar Kabir, the acting president of Ekattorer Ghatak Dalal Nirmul Committee,  writer Muntasir Mamun and some leaders and activists of 23 pro-liberation organisations were holding a rally in support of the ongoing 24-hour shutdown.

They were delivering slogans demanding ban on Jamaat-e-Islami and its student wing Islami Chhatra Shibir activists and against the ongoing rally of Hefajat-e Islam from the makeshift podium.

At one stage, several hundred activists of Hefajat were seen marching towards Mohakhali intersection from Tongi to join their Shapla Chattar rally and tension brewed.
